title: Wolfson History Prize special
itunes:title: Wolfson History Prize special
itunes:subtitle: The winners of this year's Wolfson History Prize, Christopher Duggan and Susan Brigden, join Rob Attar for a discussion about their books and the importance of popular history
description:
The winners of this year's Wolfson History Prize, Christopher Duggan and Susan Brigden, join Rob Attar for a discussion about their books and the importance of popular history

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
